LanguageData.RT_ZSL92_Vehicle.label: ZSL92
LanguageData.RT_ZSL92_Vehicle.description:
A light wheeled APC base on civilian truck chassis, equipped with a 30x173mm cannon and a 7.62x54mmR machine gun, also with grenade launchers, has poor armor but cheap and fast.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2, Gunner x1，Passenger x6
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
30x173mm（Main Cannon）
7.62x54mmR（Coaxial MG）
